K10D0207_H0208:167a-20: ba zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung bar
K10D0207_H0208:167a-21: gyur te / des srog chags stong phrag du ma
K10D0207_H0208:167a-22: rnams la rgyang ring po nas chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0207_H0208:167a-23: gyur te / 'di bshad do // de'i tshe 'khor
K10D0207_H0208:167a-24: der byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes
K10D0207_H0208:167a-25: bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur to //
K10D0207_H0208:167a-26: des de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan to //
K10D0207_H0208:167a-27: des sems g-yeng ba med pa dang /
K10D0207_H0208:167b-0: nem nur med pas chos kyi rnam grangs @167b 'di
K10D0207_H0208:167b-1: yon tan bsngags pa dang bcas par bzung zhing kun
K10D0207_H0208:167b-3: kun chub par byas nas kyang mos pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur te /
K10D0207_H0208:167b-9: pho brang 'khor du 'ongs nas bdag ni sman pa'o //
K10D0207_H0208:167b-10: bdag ni sman pa'o zhes bdag nyid khas 'che'o //
K10D0207_H0208:167b-11: de nas de ma thag tu srog chags nad sna
K10D0207_H0208:167b-12: tshogs kyis gzir ba stong phrag du ma srog gi
K10D0207_H0208:167b-13: skyabs kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal
K10D0207_H0208:167b-14: mtshan ga la ba der lhags so //
K10D0207_H0208:167b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan
K10D0207_H0208:167b-16: mos pa'i mthu la gnas pa'i sems kyis sems can
K10D0207_H0208:167b-17: de dag la chos kyi gzhung 'dis brims so //
K10D0207_H0208:167b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las gang rig sngags 'byung ba de dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang /
K10D0207_H0208:167b-20: yongs su bzung bar byas so //
K10D0207_H0208:167b-22: de la rig sngags kyi tshig de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K10D0207_H0208:167b-31: na hi kha ga ru da /
K10D0207_H0208:167b-39: aam ga mam ga aartha yu ta; sa br'a m'a ai sha /
K10D0207_H0208:167b-40: rig sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis sems can de dag bsrung ba byas so //
K10D0207_H0208:167b-41: des gal te gdug pas zos pa'am /
K10D0207_H0208:168a-0: gal te mi ma yin pas gtses @168a *//
K10D0207_H0208:168a-2: srog chags kyi rigs dug can gang yang rung pa 'ga' zhig gis zin pa'am /
K10D0207_H0208:168a-3: gal te nad skem pa dang /
K10D0207_H0208:168a-9: nad sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir ba'i sems can de dag nad de dang /
K10D0207_H0208:168a-10: de dag las rab tu thar bar byas so //
K10D0207_H0208:168a-12: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal
K10D0207_H0208:168a-13: mtshan gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gnas nas
K10D0207_H0208:168a-14: sems can de rnams nad las rab tu thar bar
K10D0207_H0208:168a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo
K10D0207_H0208:168a-18: rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam
K10D0207_H0208:168a-19: du sems na de de ltar mi blta'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168a-21: de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems
K10D0207_H0208:168a-22: dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur te
K10D0207_H0208:168a-23: / ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas sems can de snyed kyi don byas so //
K10D0207_H0208:168a-25: rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10D0207_H0208:168a-26: sman thams cad kyi kha ba ji lta ba de
K10D0207_H0208:168a-27: bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la blta bar
K10D0207_H0208:168a-30: byang chub sems dpa' rig sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
K10D0207_H0208:168a-31: kun chub par bgyid pas ji lta bur kun tu spyad par bgyi /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-0: bcom @168b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-2: rig sngags 'di dag 'don pa'i byang chub sems dpas gtsang sbra bya ba dang /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-3: sha mi bza' bar kun tu spyad par bya'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-4: des rkang pa gnyis kyang mi bsku'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-5: 'du 'dzi'i nad na gnas par mi bya'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-6: sems can thams cad la'ang phyi phyir zhing byams pa'i sems su bya'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-7: gang dag las 'tshe ba 'ong bar 'gyur ba de dag la sems gdug par mi bya'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang gtsang sbra ma phyed pas kha ton mi bya'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-9: sa phyogs mi gtsang bar gzhag par mi bya'o //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-10: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi lus dang /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-13: srog la mi lta bar bgyi'o snyam du sems so //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-18: khyod ji skad zer ba de bzhin no //
K10D0207_H0208:168b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-20: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-21: kun dga' bo khyod kyis zungs shig /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-23: sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de dag glang po'i rtsal dang /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-24: glang po chen po'i rtsal gyis gnon par 'gyur /
K10D0207_H0208:168b-26: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de dag seng ge'i 'gros dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-0: @169a *// khyu mchog gi 'gros su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0207_H0208:169a-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0207_H0208:169a-4: nga 'das pa'i phyin byang chub sems dpa'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0207_H0208:169a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i glegs bam du 'ong ba dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sgrom du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0207_H0208:169a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa rnams kyi lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0207_H0208:169a-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bdag gis gzung ngo //
K10D0207_H0208:169a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar zin pa bzhin
K10D0207_H0208:169a-16: du gang dag la byin pa'i sems can de dag
K10D0207_H0208:169a-17: la khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa legs so
K10D0207_H0208:169a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-20: che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-21: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169a-22: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10D0207_H0208:169b-0: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams @169b yid dga' ste /
K10D0207_H0208:169b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do //
